snippet.title: ReSetna | First Look Trailer | indie.io
snippet.description:
Get a first look at ReSetna, an upcoming 2.5D Metroidvania being developed by Today's Games.

Discover a once great civilization that has collapsed, leaving its fragments struggling under APEX. When a mysterious Signal emerges, driving robots to violence and madness, ReSetna and her drone companion, IXA, are dispatched to unravel the mysteries of the Signal and discover its true purpose.

Are you ready to delve into the ruins, navigate a broken society, face untold challenges, and eventually ReSet the future?

Wishlist ReSetna on Steam
➤https://bit.ly/ReSetna 

#metroidvania #indiegames #pcgaming #gamescom 

Visit indie.io on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/4e91q5q
